mapper.select: SELECT qna_date, idx, r.member_idx, content, m.member_name FROM product_qna r INNER JOIN member_info m ON r.member_idx = m.member_idx WHERE r.idx = #{idx} and r.deleted_yn = 'N' order by r.idx desc
mapper.delete: UPDATE product_qna SET deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE ANNOUNCE a SET a.qna_count = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_qna pq WHERE idx = #{idx}) WHERE idx = #{idx}
